seriesJson.title: Century of science
seriesJson.description: A recorded exploration of science and its importance to the 20th century American. Discussions of aspects of science affecting modern America. This series is hosted by Volta Torrey, the director of radio and television programming at Massachusetts Institute of Technology, as well as the former editor of Popular Science.
